title: Halo for PC
description:
To Install Halo:

1. Burn to CD or mount image with Daemon Tools

2. Open the CD Key Generator and generate a CD key.

3. Install the game and copy the generated CD Key into the installer when asked to.

4. Copy Halo.exe from the CRACK folder to the install directory.

5. Now have fun.


This game does work with multiplayer, but you can only play with other people running the cracked Halo. It comes up with about 20-40 servers in multiplayer. The single player campain works perfectly.
